github.client_id.helper_text: Copy paste the following 'Client ID:' under the 'General' tab in your app settings.

github.client_secret.helper_text: You will need to click on 'Generate a new client secret' and then copy paste the secret value.
github.client_secret.label: Client Secret
github.instructions.text: Instructions for how to configure the OAuth app can be found here:

instagram.client_id.helper_text: You need to open your app in the Facebook developer portal, then click on > 'App Settings' > 'Basic'. Copy paste the value in the 'App ID' field.
instagram.client_id.label: App ID
instagram.client_secret.helper_text: You need to open your app in the Facebook developer portal, then click on > 'App Settings' > 'Basic'. Copy paste the value in the 'App secret' field.
instagram.client_secret.label: App secret
instagram.instructions.text: Instructions for how to configure the OAuth app can be found here:
